item.title: AIMI: Leveraging Future Knowledge and Personalization in Sparse Event Forecasting for Treatment Adherence
item.description: AIMI: A system leveraging future knowledge & personalized data for accurate treatment adherence forecasting, paving the way for timely mobile interventions.

item.title: Dual Caption Preference Optimization for Diffusion Models
item.description: Dual Caption Preference Optimization (DCPO) significantly boosts diffusion model image quality by using paired captions to resolve data distribution conflicts and irrelevant prompt issues.

item.title: From Generation to Judgment: Opportunities and Challenges of LLM-as-a-judge
item.description: LLMs are revolutionizing AI evaluation by offering nuanced judgments surpassing traditional methods. This paper provides a taxonomy, benchmark, and future directions for LLM-as-a-judge.
